Build my Fedora 23 Desktop

Complete this after your PC is re-installed / rebuilt / recovered.

  1. Configure sudo. Switch to root
    echo '%x1kxk630     ALL=(ALL)     NOPASSWD: ALL' >> /etc/sudoers
  2. Configure proxy for yum
    sudo vi /etc/dnf/dnf.conf

    Add these with the correct password 

    proxy=http://170.64.0.72:8080
proxy_username=x1kxk630
proxy_password=<password>
  3. Install updates
    sudo yum update
  4. Install correct resolv.conf
    sudo scp taitc118:/etc/resolv.conf /etc/resolv.conf
  5. Follow these directions to install NVIDIA drivers
  6. Install Virtual Box
    1. Install the repository
      cd /etc/yum.repos.d/

      then 

      sudo wget http://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/rpm/fedora/virtualbox.repo
    2. Install VirtualBox
      sudo yum install VirtualBox-4.2
    3. Configure Virtual Box
      sudo /etc/init.d/vboxdrv setup
    4. Add VirtualBox users
      sudo usermod -a -G vboxusers x1kxk630
  7. Install Chrome
    1. Install repository
      sudo vi /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo

      Add these 

      [google-chrome]
name=google-chrome - 64-bit
baseurl=http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/rpm/stable/x86_64
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub
    2. Install Chrome
      sudo yum install google-chrome-stable
  8. Enable VirtualBox forward RDP connections to a specific VM
    1. Modify the firewalld config to allow RDP.
      sudo  firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-port=3389/tcp
    2. Add port forwarding rules
      vboxmanage setextradata kaps-win7-64-dt01 "VBoxInternal/Devices/e1000/0/LUN#0/Config/rdp/HostPort" 3389
vboxmanage setextradata kaps-win7-64-dt01 "VBoxInternal/Devices/e1000/0/LUN#0/Config/rdp/GuestPort" 3389
vboxmanage setextradata kaps-win7-64-dt01 "VBoxInternal/Devices/e1000/0/LUN#0/Config/rdp/Protocol" TCP
    3. Shutdown and start the VM
